This game is AMAZING it's the first time I play it and I never heard of it before. I played it with my friend and it is definitely the best thing we've ever played. The story, the easter eggs, the puzzles, THE GRAPHICS, it's amazing. And the music too. I really can't fathom this game is already old but it is still really good??? if there's a sequel I'd definitely buy it again and play it. (Actually please make a sequel if possible, I really enjoy playing this with my friend)

lots of fun, very well thought out and just overall a very good and unique game
also dirt cheap and runs on a potato, what's not to love?
Love the story, love the design, love the characters, love this game.
I love this game. Big improvement from the first one.

This game is great! Portal 2 has great graphics, good puzzles and a great story! Only downside is that if you want to make your own puzzles that look good and detailed then you have to use hammer but for me i cant install hammer nor can i remove a hammer shortcut that dosnt work on my pc, other then that it runs at around 60 fps even though the graphics are great

Just a must have game.

Get this game if you've never had it before. And get the bundle for portal 1 & 2, especially when it's on sale. Got both these games for $4 even though I've finished both of them several times before, and it was 100% worth it. That's what I'm counting on. ;)

Just get it, you won't regret it.

After producing a masterpiece of a first game, it's hard to believe that Valve was able to produce just as good of a sequel. They continue to innovate with mechanics and puzzle design that feel well thought out and not extraneous on top of the beautifully simple mechanics of Portal. The story and world are fleshed out in a way that feels like a just continuation of the famous original Portal story. Overall, it is definitely still worth the play.
Really fun and a great thing to do in your spare time!!
